name: Persons qualified to take blood specimen
text: No person, other than a physician, registered nurse, phlebotomist deemed qualified by the director of a clinical laboratory that is licensed by the State, or person licensed in a clinical laboratory occupation under section 321-13, may withdraw blood for the purpose of determining the alcohol concentration or drug content therein.  This limitation shall not apply to the taking of a breath or urine specimen. [L 2000, c 189, pt of §23]
